name: 1037WMGM
0:
”Alexa, open one oh three point seven w. m. g. m.”
”Alexa, launch one oh three point seven w. m. g. m.”
”Alexa, play one oh three point seven w. m. g. m.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: one oh three point seven w. m. g. m.
des:
If it rocks, 103.7 WMGM plays it! To get started, just say "Alexa, enable one oh three point seven W. M. G. M. skill". 

WMGM broadcasts on 50,000-watts of power – the biggest signal in the region... reaching listeners beyond the southern Jersey Shore all the way south to Delaware North, as far north as Ocean County and as far west as Cumberland and Camden Counties. From the legendary music of Led Zeppelin and Pink Floyd to today’s greatest rock hits by Metallica and Foo Fighters and everything in between. And our music isn’t the only thing that rocks at WMGM. It’s our all-star roster of seasoned live on-air talent – Matt Murray, Sean Patrick, Moon, April and Lauren – who rock South Jersey all week long. Playing the greatest rock music of all time, and boasting a stellar lineup of live programming and on-air personalities, 103.7 WMGM is South Jersey’s #1 Rock Station!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
